    • Constructor Detail

      • NPC

        public NPC(@NotNull
           @NotNull org.bukkit.Location loc,
           @NotNull
           @NotNull String name,
           @NotNull
           @NotNull String skinOwner)
        Creates an NPC.
        Parameters:
        loc - The location to spawn the NPC at.
        name - The name of the npc - Cannot be longer than 16 characters, ChatColors included. If more than 16 characters are needed, consinder spawning a Hologram (com.exortions.pluginutils.hologram.Hologram)
        skinOwner - The username of the owner of the skin.

    • Method Detail

        public void setNpcSkin(@NotNull
                       @NotNull String owner)
                throws IOException
        Sets the skin for the NPC.
        Parameters:
        owner - The skin owner's username.
        Throws:
        IOException - If the InputStreamReader couldn't be read.

      • setLocation

        Sets the location of the NPC.

      • sendPacket

        public void sendPacket(@NotNull
                       @NotNull org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Sends the packet to a sepcified player. This will show the player the NPC, and needs to be called either on PlayerJoinEvent, or when needed.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to send the packet to.

      • sendPacketToAllPlayers

        public void sendPacketToAllPlayers()
        Sends the packet to all online players.
